Title: Requires local social services districts to provide luggage to children in foster care
Summary: Requires the local social services districts to provide luggage to children in foster care; provides that eligible expenditures for such luggage shall be subject to state reimbursement under the foster care block grant.
LawCode: Amd ยง398-f, Soc Serv L (as proposed in S.3781 & A.5434)
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to requiring local social services districts to provide luggage to children in foster care
